channel.title: The Uchiha Village for trade!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Uchiha Village for trade!" - Looking for Kaiju drops and, or runes. Will also trade villagers for stuff.

item.title: Re: The Uchiha Village for trade!
item.content:encoded: Nendo was an exception solely because of who purchased it, that likely will not happen again. We dont care if you're the kage or not giffica, we will still burn it to send that message you refuse to listen to.

item.title: Re: The Uchiha Village for trade!
item.content:encoded: Rules of what? Iv read them a lot more than you. Trust me! Also. I wont be kage. You didnt burn Nendo.

item.title: Re: The Uchiha Village for trade!
item.content:encoded:
Firstoff, I'm fairly certain selling villages and players is against the rules.
Second anyone who purchases this village needs to understand that with or WITHOUT Giffica's presence in it, it WILL be melted and destroyed. We told him he was no longer allowed to be a kage, so he ignored us and cowardly hides behind the NRF/Non NRF divide. The Uchiha will be melted to send him a message that he needs to listen to us, or his people will suffer equally to him.

item.title: Re: The Uchiha Village for trade!
item.content:encoded: Just sad to watch someone Sell a Village

item.title: Re: The Uchiha Village for trade!
item.content:encoded: They will listen to Kaiju. Iv had offers from stone and others, but its easier to just trade the village. Ill remake one in late S4 or early S5.

item.title: Re: The Uchiha Village for trade!
item.content:encoded: true, but they'll need a village, so why not go where he tells them? :)

item.title: Re: The Uchiha Village for trade!
item.content:encoded: I'd like to point out that you don't actually own your villagers, and as such you can't trade them.

item.title: The Uchiha Village for trade!
item.content:encoded:
The minimum is this:
2 Books, Lab Coat (or Red Water), Go Piece, Regalia, Magical Wand, Polar Star. Star, wand and Reg are switchable for something of equal value. Coat and Water can be changed for another kage useful item.
I have this offer so dont tell me its too much.

Will also trade villagers for stuff. If you want them you must make the same offer since i can trade the whole thing for equal.
